description: Tune into the Mormon Channel, the official radio station of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Originating from famous Temple Square in Salt Lake City, Utah, the Mormon Channel offers great programming on parenting, self-reliance, improving marriage, and many other topics. You can also hear great music from the Mormon Tabernacle Choir, including their weekly broadcast, Music and the Spoken Word. The channel is available 24 hours a day, seven days a week on your Palm Pre or Palm Pixi device. The application also offers uplifting on-demand content, including addresses from Church leaders, as well as audio recordings from magazines and recordings from the scriptures.
